Detail: Reduced customer down time from 8 to 2 days through effectively deploying UPS drop locations and drop shipments to various locations central to HP remote Technicians.
Achived same day order placing within logistics by interoducing presonally written software to automate incoming purchase request and place them into purchasing system.
Created HP Network EYE tool for Field Service Technicians to scan a clients network for on service devices and retrieve page counts and leve of supplies and schedule services accordingly.
